section.p: The rukh is defeated at last. Inside the nest, you see the remains of a previous victim. In a satchel, you find a , and . There are also several rukh eggs, but they are too large to carry.

You now have the problem of getting back to earth from this remote peak.
If you have some rope, .
If not, you realize you are trapped, for the nest is set at the top of a pinnacle of rock. You will starve to death here - .
